member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_LEVEL_TIER_CONSTRAINTS_HEVC
member.summary: Associates a level and a tier for High Efficiency Video Coding (HEVC) level-setting configuration.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_LEVEL_TIER_CONSTRAINTS_HEVC.Level
member.summary: A member of the enumeration specifying the encoder level.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_LEVEL_TIER_CONSTRAINTS_HEVC.Tier
member.summary: A member of the enumeration specifying the encoder level.
